forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High around 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with mostly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with mostly cloudy skies. High 44F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 34F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 43F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
